channel.title: 508/525 Spawn while fighting how do I disable that?
channel.description:
Hey guys how do I disable spawning items while fighting and spawning items while in the wilderness, and I also want to stop teleporting from fights
Another questing: How do I make the Varrock Wilderness multi combat and the first tile of the ditch safe?
